encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - TEXT: correct spacing before scribal accents throughout; remove lunate sigma in l.5; recode double brackets in l.7 as scribal correction; correct the code for scribal acute over lacunose letter at start of l.8; confirm iota subscript at end of l.8 (ed.pr. has adscript); recode l.10 not as |reg| but as a trio of scribal corrections; recode double brackets in l.12 as scribal correction; recode double brackets in l.13 as scribal correction; add lost.?lin after final line (confirmed on digital image). META: add image link (https://quod.lib.umich.edu/a/apis/x-1317/11R.TIF); display name is P. Mich. 3. 139; add date (1920) to provenance (as ‘acquired’ not found); re-add Simias (TLG 0211 TM author 856; CWKB 1085; TM Work 2426) and Hesiod (TLG 0020 CWKB 917; TM Work 1915) to author info as they are possible and helpful for searching/indexing. BIBLIO: 95618 previous edition pp. 133-136; 87652 (study); 10252 #906 (reference edition); 3559 #139 (principal edition); 77028 (study) 87-95; Traversa is 4762; change 29144 to ‘readings’; add 39811 (study)

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - TEXT: correct spacing before scribal accents throughout; remove lunate sigma in l.5; recode double brackets in l.7 as scribal correction; correct the code for scribal acute over lacunose letter at start of l.8; confirm iota subscript at end of l.8 (ed.pr. has adscript); recode l.10 not as |reg| but as a trio of scribal corrections; recode double brackets in l.12 as scribal correction; recode double brackets in l.13 as scribal correction; add lost.?lin after final line (confirmed on digital image). META: add image link (https://quod.lib.umich.edu/a/apis/x-1317/11R.TIF); display name is P. Mich. 3. 139; add date (1920) to provenance (as ‘acquired’ not found); re-add Simias (TLG 0211 TM author 856; CWKB 1085; TM Work 2426) and Hesiod (TLG 0020 CWKB 917; TM Work 1915) to author info as they are possible and helpful for searching/indexing. BIBLIO: 95618 previous edition pp. 133-136; 87652 (study); 10252 #906 (reference edition); 3559 #139 (principal edition); 77028 (study) 87-95; Traversa is 4762; change 29144 to ‘readings’; add 39811 (study)

Submit - Originally submitted to litpap.info 2018.07.26 by Marco Perale. Submission has been transferred to papyri.info. Submission notes were: “Entering current and past work on hexameter adespota. Text after Perale 2014 (with small amendments). Deleted vol. number in Editions and bibliography; added bibliography; measurements, MP3 number, script type (in both ‘Physical Description’ and ‘General Notes’). NB: I have deleted Hesiod and Simias of Rhodes in Author & Work section; there is now a general consensus that the fragment is by neither.“
